name: SimpleBuffs
enabledTests: SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ApplyStacks.When the updated stacks is above zero.When MaxStacks is exceeded.Should not apply more buffs
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ApplyStacks.When the updated stacks is above zero.When RefreshPolicy is ESimpleBuffsRefreshPolicy::DoNotRefresh.Should reset timing values

SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ApplyStacks.When the updated stacks is above zero.When RefreshPolicy is ESimpleBuffsRefreshPolicy::Extend.When stacks are at MaxStacks.Should clamp stacks and avoid extending duration
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ApplyStacks.When the updated stacks is above zero.When RefreshPolicy is ESimpleBuffsRefreshPolicy::Extend.Should not reset timing values
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ApplyStacks.When the updated stacks is above zero.When RefreshPolicy is ESimpleBuffsRefreshPolicy::RefreshDuration.Should reset timing values
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ApplyStacks.When the updated stacks is above zero.Should update stacks and broadcast OnBuffStacksUpdated
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ApplyStacks.When the updated stacks is zero.Should update stacks and broadcast OnBuffExpiration
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.GetAccumulatedTime.Should return correct value
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.GetLastExecutedTime.Should return correct value
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.GetNumberOfStacks.Should return the number of stack instances
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.GetTimeRemaining.Should return TimeRemaining

SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.GetTimeUntilNextTick.When ApplicationType is ESimpleBuffsApplicationType::OverTime.When TickInterval is greater than zero.Should return the time until next tick based on TickInterval
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.GetTimeUntilNextTick.When ApplicationType is ESimpleBuffsApplicationType::OverTime.When TickInterval is zero.Should return zero
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.GetTimeUntilNextTick.When ApplicationType is ESimpleBuffsApplicationType::Persistent.Should return zero
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.InflateFromDefinition.Should set all values from the definition
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.IsExpired.When Duration is greater than zero.When TimeRemaining is greater than zero.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.IsExpired.When Duration is greater than zero.When TimeRemaining is zero.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.IsExpired.When Duration is zero.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ProcessTick.When not expired.When buff ticks.When RefreshPolicy is ESimpleBuffsRefreshPolicy::DoNotRefresh.Should apply DeltaTime and broadcast appropriately
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ProcessTick.When not expired.When buff ticks.When RefreshPolicy is ESimpleBuffsRefreshPolicy::Extend.Should apply DeltaTime and broadcast appropriately
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ProcessTick.When not expired.When buff ticks.When RefreshPolicy is ESimpleBuffsRefreshPolicy::RefreshDuration.Should apply DeltaTime and broadcast appropriately
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ProcessTick.When not expired.When buff ticks.When TickInterval or Duration are invalid.Should broadcast expiration once and not tick
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.Refresh.When Refresh is called after expiration via ApplyStacks.Should clear expiration, refresh timers, and re-broadcast expiration on next expiry
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.Refresh.Should reset timing values
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ShouldApplyImmediately.When bApplyImmediately is false.When ApplicationType is ESimpleBuffsApplicationType::OverTime.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ShouldApplyImmediately.When bApplyImmediately is false.When ApplicationType is ESimpleBuffsApplicationType::Persistent.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuff.ShouldApplyImmediately.When bApplyImmediately is true.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.ApplyBuff.When buff is not registered.When buff can be created.Should create buff, add delegates, and add to ActiveBuffs
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.ApplyBuff.When buff is not registered.When buff cannot be created.Should do nothing
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.ApplyBuff.When buff is registered.Should update stacks
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.ApplyBuff.When called multiple times before tick.Should reuse the pending buff and accumulate stacks once active
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.GetAllBuffs.When buffs are not registered.Should return an empty set
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.GetAllBuffs.When buffs are registered.Should return all buffs
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.GetAllBuffsByCategory.Should return buffs that match the category across active and pending sets
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.GetBuff.When buff is not registered.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.GetBuff.When buff is registered.Should return buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.GetTarget / SetTarget.When TargetActor is not set.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.GetTarget / SetTarget.When TargetActor is set.Should return TargetActor
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.HasBuff.When buff is not registered.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.HasBuff.When buff is registered.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.IsEmpty.When a buff is registered.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.IsEmpty.When no buffs are registered.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.ProcessTick.When a buff expires.Should broadcast OnRemoveBuff when a buff expires
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.ProcessTick.Should run ProcessTick on all active buffs
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.RefreshBuff.When buff is not registered.Should do nothing
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.RefreshBuff.When buff is registered.Should refresh buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.RemoveAllBuffs.Should remove all buffs and broadcast
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.RemoveBuff.When buff is not registered.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.RemoveBuff.When buff is registered.Should remove, return, and broadcast buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.RemoveBuffStacks.When buff is not registered.Should do nothing
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsCoordinator.RemoveBuffStacks.When buff is registered.Should update stacks with a negative value.
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.ApplyBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should create new coordinator and apply buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.ApplyBuff.When actor is tracked.Should apply buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.GetAllBuffCoordinators.Should include active coordinators
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.GetAllBuffCoordinators.Should include coordinators queued in pending additions
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.GetBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.GetBuff.When actor is tracked.When buff does not exist.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.GetBuff.When actor is tracked.When buff exists.Should return buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.GetBuffCoordinator.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.GetBuffCoordinator.When actor is tracked.Should return buff coordinator
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.HandleActorDestroyed.Should discard pending additions when actor is destroyed before the first tick
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.HasAnyBuffs.When actor is not tracked.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.HasAnyBuffs.When actor is tracked.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.HasBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.HasBuff.When actor is tracked.When buff does not exist.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.HasBuff.When actor is tracked.When buff exists.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.Integration Test.Should apply, stack, tick, and expire real buffs over time
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.IsPaused.When paused.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.IsPaused.When running.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.IsRunning.When paused.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.IsRunning.When running.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.Pause.Should update state
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.RefreshBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.RefreshBuff.When actor is tracked.Should refresh and return buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.RemoveAllBuffs.Should remove all buffs and tear down delegates
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.RemoveAllBuffsOnTarget.When actor is not tracked.Should do nothing
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.RemoveAllBuffsOnTarget.When actor is tracked.Should remove all buffs and tear down delegates
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.RemoveBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.RemoveBuff.When actor is tracked.Should remove and return buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.RemoveBuffStacks.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.RemoveBuffStacks.When actor is tracked.Should remove stacks and return buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.Resume.Should update state
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsSubsystem.Tick.Should advance all active coordinators
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.AdvanceTurn.Should advance all active coordinators
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.ApplyBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should create new coordinator and apply buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.ApplyBuff.When actor is tracked.When buff should apply immediately.Should broadcast apply without advancing turns
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.ApplyBuff.When actor is tracked.Should apply buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.GetAllBuffCoordinators.Should include active coordinators
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.GetAllBuffCoordinators.Should include coordinators queued in pending additions
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.GetBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.GetBuff.When actor is tracked.When buff does not exist.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.GetBuff.When actor is tracked.When buff exists.Should return buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.GetBuffCoordinator.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.GetBuffCoordinator.When actor is tracked.Should return buff coordinator
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.HandleActorDestroyed.Should discard pending additions when actor is destroyed before the first turn
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.HasAnyBuffs.When actor is not tracked.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.HasAnyBuffs.When actor is tracked.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.HasBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.HasBuff.When actor is tracked.When buff does not exist.Should return false
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.HasBuff.When actor is tracked.When buff exists.Should return true
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.Integration Test.Should apply, stack, tick, and expire real buffs over turns
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.RefreshBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.RefreshBuff.When actor is tracked.Should refresh and return buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.RemoveAllBuffs.Should remove all buffs and tear down delegates
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.RemoveAllBuffsOnTarget.When actor is not tracked.Should do nothing
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.RemoveAllBuffsOnTarget.When actor is tracked.Should remove all buffs and tear down delegates
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.RemoveBuff.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.RemoveBuff.When actor is tracked.Should remove and return buff
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.RemoveBuffStacks.When actor is not tracked.Should return nullptr
SimpleBuffs.SimpleBuffsTurnBasedSubsystem.RemoveBuffStacks.When actor is tracked.Should remove stacks and return buff
